
                            
                            <p>主卫正对床，所以做了衣柜暗门，暗门进去里面还有东墙跟西墙两面做了大约75宽的衣柜，这个地方大约高度2.45米，长度 1米左右，宽度1米左右，现在上方只安装了一个4000k 7w的筒灯，感觉亮度不够，开衣柜取衣服会视线遮挡好多，问下大家怎么弄灯比较好点，比如上方两个筒灯，还是说弄一个10w6500k 的筒灯 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130231hvwk6y0icghzkh6g.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130231hvwk6y0icghzkh6g.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130235opk8kmzhcz9m3php.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130235opk8kmzhcz9m3php.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130239c9fdt6tu9sg9vieu.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130239c9fdt6tu9sg9vieu.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130242am2uklk75bebs5f4.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/12/130242am2uklk75bebs5f4.jpeg"> <br> </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
